message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. Given its unique features and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering the time, effort, and resources invested into creating this product, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusivity and the potential long-term benefits it could bring to you. I trust that you will find its value to be well beyond what you pay. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
